item.title: logcat, but just one package
item.description: I like to view the logcat output for just my app and nothing else. Here’s a small shell script I use for this. function logcat { pkg="$1" shift if [ -z "$pkg" ]; then >&2 echo 'Usage: logcat pkg ...' return 1 fi uid="$(adb shell pm list package -U $pkg | sed 's/.*uid://')" if [ -z "$uid" ]; then >&2 echo "pkg '$pkg' not found" return 1 fi adb logcat --uid="$uid" "$@" } Usage is:
